The activation of dormant LSCs and deactivation of proliferating LSCs are described by rate constants p XY and pYX respectively. LSCs proliferate with a rate constant p. During therapy, a cytotoxic TKI effect acts on proliferating LSCs, described by the rate e TKI >0.
